main event: Several fragments of light were observed in the sky over Brazil on February 8, 1962, which were later deemed to likely be a meteor or fireball.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes., The event was reported over the radio as a UFO., Investigation led the Air Force to classify it likely as a meteor/fireball., There were several unidentified witnesses in the area., A more detailed report has been requested but not yet received.
sighted object: fragments of light in the sky
